title: Coordinate a Critical Crane Lift
description: A site manager must coordinate a critical lift of a large HVAC unit onto the roof, which requires temporarily closing a section of the site.

tasks.description: Create a lift plan, specifying the crane position, load weight, and exclusion zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal lift plan document is created.

tasks.description: Notify all site personnel of the time and area of the upcoming crane lift and exclusion zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: A site-wide safety notification is sent out.
